import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; interface Props { match: any; } const ProductScreen = ({ match }: Props) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product?.name}

 Description: {product?.description} Price: $ {product?.price} Status: {product && product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
